EmailTemplate.description: The Approved to Sell By has been updated on the Opportunity
EmailTemplate.name: Request to Sell By is Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Request to Sell Approval has been Accepted
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The Request to Sell Approval for the Opportunity named: {!Opportunity.Name} has been accepted. To view and update this Opportunity, follow the link: {!Opportunity.Id}
